about_the_game:
Armor Icon Set is an RPG Maker official collection of icons made in pixel art.
With "Armor Icon Set", you have access to 64 high-quality pixel art armor sprites inspired by armor and clothing from fantasy RPG worlds; they come in 16 unique sets of 4 armor pieces (head, torso, arm, and legs.)They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant armor sprites hand-drawn in pixel art from the size of 16x16px then upscaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to give the feel of classic pixel art video games.

■Includes armor sets fit for job classes like warriors, rogues, archers, mages, clerics, priests, knights, and more!

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


【Icon Set (1 Sheet)】

Includes:
1.) armor-icons.png
2.) IconSet.png
3.) “individual-sprites” folder containing the 64 armor icons in their individual images.

【Tile Set (1 sheet)】
item-drop-armor_E.png

Armor Icon Set is an RPG Maker official collection of icons made in pixel art.
With "Armor Icon Set", you have access to 64 high-quality pixel art armor sprites inspired by armor and clothing from fantasy RPG worlds; they come in 16 unique sets of 4 armor pieces (head, torso, arm, and legs.)They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant armor sprites hand-drawn in pixel art from the size of 16x16px then upscaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to give the feel of classic pixel art video games.

■Includes armor sets fit for job classes like warriors, rogues, archers, mages, clerics, priests, knights, and more!

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
